Name: Ashe
passive: (Innate): While not autoattacking, Ashe's critical strike chance increases by 3 / 6 / 9 / 12 / 15 / 18 % every 3 seconds. This bonus critical strike chance is removed after Ashe's next autoattack.

Name: Heimerdinger
passive: (Innate): Heimerdinger gives himself and nearby allied structures and units 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 health regeneration per 5 seconds.

Name: Graves
passive: (Innate): Graves gains 1 / 2 / 3 bonus armor and magic resistance every second he remains in combat. This bonus stacks up to 10 times. Graves is considered in combat if he has dealt or received damage in the last 3 seconds.

Name: Riven
passive: (Innate): Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her to do 5 / 7 / 9 / 11 / 13 / 15 (+0.5 per bonus attack damage) bonus physical damage on her next autoattack. Riven can store up to 3 charges, and will only expend one at a time.

Name: Sona
passive: (Innate): After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals extra 14 + (9 x level) magic damage. This enhanced attack has an additional effect depending on which spell was cast last.

Name: Ahri
passive: (Innate): Ahri gains a charge of Essence Theft whenever one of her spells hits an enemy. This caps at 3 charges per spell cast. Upon reaching 9 charges, Ahri's next spell will have 35% bonus spell vamp.

Name: Akali
passive: (Innate): Discipline of Force - Upon obtaining 20 ability power, Akali's autoattacks deal 8% bonus magic damage, increasing by 1% for every 6 ability power gained thereafter. The bonus magic damage doesn't affect towers, but it affects other structures.

Name: Discipline of Might - Upon obtaining 10 bonus attack damage, Akali gains 8% spell vamp, increasing by an additional 1% for every 6 bonus attack damage gained thereafter.
Amumu
passive: (Innate): Amumu's autoattacks reduce the target's magic resistance by 15 / 25 / 35 for 4 seconds. The debuff doesn't stack but it refreshes with every autoattack.

Name: Alistar
passive: (Innate): Each time Alistar casts a spell, he gains the ability to move through units and will deal 9 + (1 x level) + (0.1 per ability power) magic damage per second to nearby enemy units and structures for 3 seconds. It deals double damage to minions and monsters.

Name: Anivia
passive: (Innate): Upon dying, Anivia will revert into an egg and will get an armor and magic resistance modifier of -40 / -25 / -10 / +5 / +20. If the egg can survive for six seconds, she is reborn with the same percentage of health that her egg had left. This can only happen once every four minutes regardless of cooldown reduction.

Name: Annie
passive: (Innate): After every 5 spell casts, Annie's next offensive spell will stun its target for 1.75 seconds.

Name: Brand
passive: (Innate): Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing 2% of their maximum health as magic damage per second for 4 seconds.(Max: 80 damage [per second] vs. Monsters)

Name: Caitlyn
passive: (Innate):After every 8 / 7 / 6 autoattacks, Caitlyn's next autoattack will be enhanced to be a headshot, dealing 150% damage to a champion or 250% damage to a minion or monster. Attacks from brush grant two charges instead of one.

Name: Cassiopeia
passive: (Innate): After casting a spell, any subsequent spellcasts will cost 10% less for 5 seconds. This ability stacks up to 5 times.

Name: Cho\'Gath
passive: (Innate): Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he restores 32 + (2 x level) health and 3.25 + (0.25 x level) mana.

Name: Corki
passive: (Innate): Corki's autoattacks deal 10% of his total physical damage before armor adjustment, as additional true damage to minions, monsters, and champions.

Name: Evelynn
passive: (Innate): Damage received from enemy minions (not jungle monsters) is reduced by 50%.

Name: Fiddlesticks
passive: (Innate): Nearby enemy units have their magic resistance reduced by 10. (1000 range)

Name: Galio
passive: (Innate): Galio receives 50% of his total magic resistance as additional ability power.

Name: Gangplank
passive: (Innate): Gangplank's basic attacks apply a poison debuff for 3 seconds that can stack up to 3 times. Each stack deals 3 + (1 × level) magic damage per second and slows the target by 7%.

Name: Garen
passive: (Innate): Garen will regenerate 0.5% of his maximum health per second after not receiving damage for 7 seconds. The regenerative state will stop if Garen receives damage.

Name: Fizz
passive: (Innate): Fizz's dexterity allows him to perpetually ignore unit collision and take 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 / 12 / 14 reduced physical damage from autoattacks.

Name: Janna
passive: (Innate): Increases the movement speed of all allied champions by 3%. This bonus is lost while Janna is dead.

Name: Jax
passive: (Innate): Every time Jax attacks an enemy, he gains 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 / 12 / 14 % attack speed for 2.5 seconds (stacks up to 6 times).

Name: Jarvan_IV
passive: (Innate): Jarvan IV's first attack on a target deals 6 / 8 / 10 % of their current health as bonus physical damage. This caps at 400 damage. This effect cannot occur on the same target for 6 seconds.

Name: Kassadin
passive: (Innate): Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage after magic resistance reductions have been applied. Kassadin converts each point of this ignored damage into 1% bonus attack speed. Each of these conversions last individually for 4 seconds and the attack speed will stack.

Name: Karthus
passive: (Innate): Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form, which allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds. During this time, his abilities cost no mana.

Name: Karma
passive: (Innate): Karma gains up to 30 / 50 / 70 / 90 / 110 / 130 increased ability power corresponding to her percentage of missing health.

Name: Kennen
passive: (Innate): Kennen's abilities add Marks of the Storm to opponents which last for 8 seconds. An opponent is stunned for 1 second upon receiving 3 Marks of the Storm, and Kennen receives 25 energy. The stun has a diminished effect, and will only stun for approx 0.5 seconds if applied more than once within 7 seconds.

Name: Dr._Mundo
passive: (Innate): Dr. Mundo is granted 0.3% of his maximum health as bonus health regeneration per second.

Name: Lee_Sin
passive: (Innate): After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 autoattacks within 3 seconds gain 50% attack speed and return 15 energy each.

Name: Malphite
passive: (Innate): Malphite's skin innately produces a layer of rock as a shield which absorbs damage of up to 10% of his maximum health. The shield will recharge if Malphite has not received damage in the last 10 seconds.

Name: Maokai
passive: (Innate): Each time a spell is cast near Maokai, he gains a charge of Sap Magic. When he has 5 charges, his next autoattack will heal him for 7% of his maximum health.

Name: Master_Yi
passive: (Innate): Master Yi strikes twice every 7th attack.

Name: Miss_Fortune
passive: (Innate): Miss Fortune gains an additional 25 movement speed after not taking any damage for 7 seconds, increasing thereafter by 4 every second up until reaching 70 bonus movement speed.

Name: Mordekaiser
passive: (Innate): 35% of the damage dealt from abilities is converted into a temporary absorption shield. Shield generation is only half as effective against minions and monsters. Maximum shield strength is 90 + (30 x level). The shield decays by 3% per second.

Name: Malzahar
passive: (Innate): After casting 4 spells, Malzahar summons a Voidling for 21 seconds. Voidlings have 200 + (50 x level) health and 20 + (5 x level) + (+1.0 per bonus attack damage) attack damage (bonus autoattack damage isn't noticed in tooltip or voidling's stats, but it affects damage done by voidling). The voidlings benefit from Malzahar's armor penetration.

Name: Voidlings grow after 7 seconds (+50% base damage/armor), and Frenzy after 14 seconds (increased attack speed).
Voidlings will always attack the target affected by Malzahar's most recently cast Malefic Visions. If there are no targets affected by Malefic Visions, it will attack random targets.
Nasus
passive: (Innate): Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him a natural 14 / 17 / 20% lifesteal.

Name: Nocturne
passive: (Innate): Every 10 seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for 120% of his physical damage and heals himself for 15 / 20 / 25 per target hit. Nocturne's autoattacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

Name: Nunu
passive: (Innate): After 7 autoattacks, Nunu's next spell will have no cost.

Name: Nidalee
passive: (Innate): Moving through brush increases Nidalee's movement speed by 15%. The buff lasts for an additional 2 seconds after leaving brush.

Name: Orianna
passive: (Innate): Oriannaâ€™s autoattacks deal an additional 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 (+0.2 per ability power) magic damage every hit. Additionally, subsequent attacks on the same target within 4 seconds deal an extra 15% magic damage per hit. This extra damage bonus stacks up to three times.

Name: Olaf
passive: (Innate): For every 1% of his health missing, Olaf's attack speed increases by 1%.

Name: Pantheon
passive: (Innate): After attacking or casting spells 4 times, Pantheon will gain a shield that will block the next normal or enhanced standard attack that deals more than 40 damage to him.

Name: Poppy
passive: (Innate): Any damage dealt to Poppy that exceeds 10% of her current health is reduced by 50%. This does not reduce damage from structures.

Name: Shaco
passive: (Innate): Shaco deals 20% bonus damage when striking a unit from behind with his autoattacks or abilities.

Name: Shen
passive: (Innate): Every 8 seconds, Shen's next attack will deal bonus magic damage equal to 5 + (5 × level) + (8% of his bonus health). Whenever an enemy champion hits Shen with a basic attack, the cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

Name: Singed
passive: (Innate): Singed receives 25% of his mana as bonus health.

Name: Sion
passive: (Innate): Sion has a 40% chance to ignore up to 30 / 40 / 50 damage each time he is hit by an autoattack. The damage reduction is calculated before armor and percentage damage reduction benefits are taken into account.

Name: Sivir
passive: (Innate): Sivir gains 50 movement speed for 2 seconds when she lands a basic attack on an enemy champion.

Name: Skarner
passive: (Innate): Using autoattacks against champions lowers the cooldowns of Skarner's abilities by 1 second and by 0.5 seconds when used against non-champion units. Autoattacks on towers won't reduce cooldowns at all.

Name: Soraka
passive: (Innate): Increases surrounding allies' magic resistance by 16.

Name: Taric
passive: (Innate): Taric's autoattacks replenish his mana for 7.5% of the damage dealt.

Name: Teemo
passive: (Innate): If Teemo stands still and takes no action for 2 seconds, he becomes stealthed. Moving or taking actions will break Teemo out of stealth and will boost his attack speed by 40% for 3 seconds.

Name: Trundle
passive: (Innate): Whenever an enemy unit near Trundle dies, he heals for 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6% of their maximum health.

Name: Twisted_Fate
passive: (Innate): Twisted Fate and his allies receive an additional 2 gold per unit kill. This bonus is lost while Twisted Fate is dead.

Name: Twitch
passive: (Innate): Twitch's attacks infect the target with Deadly Venom, which deals 2.5 / 5 / 7.5 / 10 true damage each second, stacking up to 6 times, and lasting up to 6 seconds.

Name: Udyr
passive: (Innate): Udyr's attack speed is increased by 10% for 5 seconds each time he switches stances. This effect can stack up to 3 times. Switching stances sets off a 1.0 second global cooldown.

Name: Viktor
passive: (Innate): Viktor starts with an item that takes up one of his item slots, the Hex Core, that provides him with stats and can be upgraded in the store to augment one of his abilities and improve its stats. The Hex Core can only be upgraded once, for 1000 gold, and cannot be sold back to the store.

Name: Hex Core: Grants Viktor 3 ability power per level.
Vladimir
passive: (Innate): Every 40 points of bonus health grants Vladimir 1 ability power and every 1 point of ability power grants Vladimir 1.4 bonus health. These bonuses do not stack with themselves.

Name: Volibear
passive: (Innate): When Volibear's health drops below 30% of his maximum health, he will heal for 30% of his maximum health over the next 6 seconds. This passive effect has a 120 second cooldown.

Name: Warwick
passive: (Innate): Each of Warwick's autoattacks will heal him for 6 / 12 / 18 health. Each successive attack against the same target will stack this amount of healing up to a maximum of 3 stacks per strike. The stacks remain for 4 seconds.

Name: Xin_Zhao
passive: (Innate): Xin Zhao is healed for 25 / 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50 / 55 / 60 / 65 for every 3 attacks that he lands.

Name: Yorick
passive: (Innate): Yorick takes 5% less damage and his autoattacks deal 5% more damage for each summon that is active.

Name: Zilean
passive: (Innate): Increases the experience himself and all allied champions gain by 8%. This is not in effect while Zilean is dead.

Name: Wukong
passive: (Innate): Wukong's armor and magic resistance are increased by 4 / 6 / 8 for each nearby enemy champion.

Name: Irelia
passive: (Innate): Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, snares, immobilizes, blinds and silences for each nearby enemy champion.

Name: Katarina
passive: (Innate): After a kill or an assist, Katarina gains 25 gold and her cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds.

Name: Gragas
passive: (Innate): Gragas takes a drink from his cask every time he uses an ability, restoring 2% of his maximum health over 4 seconds.

Name: Kog\'Maw
passive: (Innate): Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which allows him to move faster for 4 seconds and detonate at the end of the duration, dealing 100 + (25 x level) true damage to surrounding enemies.

Name: LeBlanc
passive: (Innate): When LeBlanc is brought below 40% health, she instantly becomes stealthed for half a second. When the stealth fades, she creates a Mirror Image of herself that can move, deals no attack damage, has 53 + (17 x level) less health, and lasts for up to 8 seconds. This can only occur once per minute, regardless of cooldown reduction. The illusion's autoattacks will proc on-hit effects (including damage).

Name: Leona
passive: (Innate): Leona's spells charge any enemy unit damaged with Sunlight for 3.5 seconds. When allied champions deal any damage to those targets they consume the Sunlight debuff to deal 20 / 35 / 50 / 65 / 80 / 95 / 110 / 125 / 140 additional magic damage. This additional damage is counted as the ally's damage and it will benefit from their magic penetration. Leona is unable to activate the additional damage herself.

Name: Lux
passive: (Innate): Lux's damaging spells charge the enemies hit with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack will ignite the energy, dealing 10 + (10 x level) magic damage to the target.

Name: Blitzcrank
passive: (Innate): When Blitzcrank's life is brought below 20% health he activates Mana Barrier, creating a shield that lasts 10 seconds. The shield strength is equal to 50% of Blitzcrank's current mana. There is a one minute cooldown before Blitzcrank can activate this effect again.

Name: Kayle
passive: (Innate): Kayle's autoattacks against enemy champions reduces their armor and magic resistance by 3% for 5 seconds. This debuff stacks up to 5 times.

Name: Ezreal
passive: (Innate): Hitting a target with any of Ezreal's abilities increases his attack speed by 10% for 6 seconds, this effect stacks up to 5 times.

Name: Morgana
passive: (Innate): Morgana is granted 10 / 20 / 30% spell vamp.

Name: Shyvana
passive: (Innate): Shyvana's autoattacks enhance her abilities.

Name: Ryze
passive: (Innate): When Ryze casts a spell, all other spells have their cooldown reduced by 1 second.

Name: Swain
passive: (Innate): Whenever Swain kills an enemy unit, he restores 9 (+1 per level) mana.

Name: Talon
passive: (Innate): Talon's autoattacks deal 10% additional damage to any target that is slowed, stunned, immobilized or suppressed.

Name: Tristana
passive: (Innate): Tristana increases her autoattack range by 9 every time she levels up (does not include level one). At level 18, the bonus is 153 (703 total range).

Name: Urgot
passive: (Innate): Urgot's autoattacks and Acid Hunter reduce all damage that his target deals by 15% for 2.5 seconds.

Name: Tryndamere
passive: (Innate): Tryndamere receives 0.35% critical strike chance per Fury.

Name: Veigar
passive: (Innate): Veigar's mana regen is increased by 0.75% for each 1% of mana he's missing.

Name: Renekton
passive: (Innate): When Renekton is below 50% health he generates 50% more fury from all sources.

Name: Rammus
passive: (Innate): Rammus receives 25% of his total armor as bonus attack damage.

Name: Rumble
passive: (Innate): When Rumble reaches 100 heat he overheats, silencing himself for 6 seconds to cooldown completely and causing his basic attacks to deal an additional 20 + (5 x level) + (0.3 per ability power) magic damage for the duration.

Name: Vayne
passive: (Innate): Vayne gains 30 flat movement speed when moving towards a nearby visible enemy champion.

Name: Xerath
passive: (Innate): Xerath receives 15% of his ability power as bonus armor.
